sentence: straighten and move the rightmost purple block to the back of the leftmost purple block
move the purple block in front of the block that you moved just before to the front right of the rearmost gold block
straighten and move the center yellow block to the front of the rearmost yellow block so that its rear right corner touches the rightmost purple block's front left corner
move the rearmost yellow block to the top of the last moved yellow block
pick up the purple block which is on the left side of the moved yellow blocks to the front side of the rightmost purple block
